entry.title: Europe Unveils World‚Äôs First AI Regulations ‚Äì How This Intersects With The Crypto Industry
entry.summary:
Friday was a big day in tech history because it was the day that European Union (EU) negotiators finished writing the world‚Äôs first complete set of rules for AI, or more popularly, artificial intelligence.
This agreement, which has been named the ‚ÄúArtificial Intelligence Act,‚Äù is a big step toward giving the technology judicial oversight.
After intense talks behind closed doors, negotiators from the European Parliament and the EU‚Äôs 27 member states were able to work out their differences and reach a preliminary political deal on the AI Act.
The talks dealt with touchy topics, such as generative AI and how police use face recognition for spying. Thierry Breton, the European Commissioner, announced the breakthrough and emphasized the EU‚Äôs leading role as the first continent to set clea‚Ä¶

entry.title: China and Singapore Team Up to Allow Tourists to Spend Digital Yuan
entry.summary:
Singapore and China have teamed up on a pilot to allow tourists in both countries to spend China‚Äôs central bank digital currency, the digital yuan. ‚ÄúThis will enhance convenience for travelers when making purchases during their overseas travel,‚Äù Singapore‚Äôs central bank described.
Tourists in China and Singpoare Can Spend Digital Yuan
Singapore‚Äôs central bank, the Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS), announced Thursday ‚Äúnew digital finance and capital markets initiatives to expand its financial cooperation with China.‚Äù
One of the initiatives is a ‚Äúcross-border e-CNY pilot between China and Singapore,‚Äù the MAS explained, adding that it and People‚Äôs Bank of China‚Äôs Digital Currency Institute (PBCDCI) signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) on digital finance cooperation in 2020. The announcement details:
MAS and PBCDCI are embarking on a pilot that will allow travellers from both countries to use e-CNY for tourism spending in Singapore and China. This will enhance convenience for travellers when making purchases during their overseas travel.
China is at the forefront of central bank digital currency (CBDC) development, actively testing its e-CNY project. Since initiating digital yuan research, the People‚Äôs Bank of China (PBOC) has steadily expanded the pilot program‚Äôs reach. Presently, there are 26 pilot areas for digital yuan spread across China.
PBOC Governor Yi Gang disclosed in July that transactions utilizing China‚Äôs central bank digital currency reached 1.8 trillion yuan ($250 billion) at the end of June. In November, Standard Chartered Bank said that it had begun offering digital yuan exchange services in China. Moreover, the Chinese central bank and the Hong Kong Monetary Authority (HKMA) have entered the second phase of integrating digital yuan for payments and cross-border transactions within Hong Kong.
What do you think about the collaboration between China and Singapore to let tourists in both countries spend digital yuan? Let us know in the comments section below.

entry.summary:
Artist Jeff Davis joins 5 Questions with SCENE to answer burning questions about his artistic practice, the path that brought him to Art Blocks, and his quietly sophisticated DJ abilities.
Video shot and edited by Vincent Roazzi Jr.

entry.title: Heatbit Founder Alex Busarov on the Bitcoin Miner That Heats Your Home
entry.summary: Decrypt joined Heatbit founder Alex Busarov at Web Summit for a walkthrough of the firm's flagship product, a Bitcoin miner that acts as a domestic space heater‚Äîaimed at the casual user.

entry.title: Nym CEO Harry Halpin on Privacy, Decentralized VPNs and Tornado Cash
entry.summary: The founder of privacy-preserving mixnet Nym sat down with Decrypt at Web Summit to talk about its new decentralized VPN, the Web3 privacy landscape and why "devs should be defended" in the wake of the Tornado Cash crackdown.

entry.title: Pat Felder - The worst is over [Macro Deep Dive Episode]
entry.summary:
Welcome to the first Markets Edition of This Time Will Be Different! In this episode we dive into the current macroeconomic conditions around crypto and look at the data behind the price action.
Reza sits down with Pat Felder, founder of Prismatic Capital to discuss the current macro environment, and to answer the question on everyone's mind-- is the bear market really over?

entry.title: The Sandbox Co-Founder Sebastien Borget: 'We're Already Integrating AI'
entry.summary: Decrypt sat down with The Sandbox co-founder Sebastien Borget at Web Summit to talk about AI, the open metaverse and the creative challenges of interoperability.

entry.title: Dacoco CEO Saro McKenna: How Alien Worlds is Creating an AI-Powered 'Lore DAO' with Kevin J Anderson
entry.summary: Decrypt joined Dacoco CEO Sarojini McKenna at Web Summit 2023 to talk about Alien Worlds' new Lore DAO and its AI-powered collaboration with sci-fi author Kevin J Anderson.

entry.title: Avalon's Jeffrey Butler on Designing a Metaverse MMO That Lets Players Co-Create
entry.summary: Avalon Chief Product Officer Jeffrey Butler speaks with Decrypt reporter Jason Nelson and details his studio's new MMO game with interoperable assets‚Äîand how it will enable players to create and monetize their own content.
